Here’s a second chance to add 100 unique items to your ever growing collection. This second 100 item super bundle includes a second set of Waterfall Terrace items, Log Cabin items, the Astrological Statue Collection, the Dragon Statue Bundle, Crystal Furniture Items, Naugahyde Furniture Items, and Translucent Furniture items. Valued at over $85, get this pack for only $4.99. As a bonus, get this pack for only $1 by owning any one of the following items: PlayStation®Home Mansion First Floor, PlayStation®Home Mansion Second Floor, PlayStation®Home Mansion Infinity Pool, Gold Suit, Diamond Suit, Emerald, Ruby, and Sapphire Suit Bundle, Animated Diamond Furniture Collection, or the Ultimate Diamond Collection Bundle.
